title: Special buildings (as defined in UDCPR-2020) with height 90 m
clause_text: Special buildings (as defined in UDCPR-2020) with height 90 m. and above shall be provided with fire break water tank system with fire pumps at every 65 m. height interval from ground level.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
source_pdf.text_snippet: Special buildings (as defined in UDCPR-2020) with height 90 m. and above shall be provided with fire break water tank system with fire pumps at every 65 m. height interval from ground level.
